title: How to Make Lots of Money in Pokemon Diamond and Pearl

steps.title: Go to the Trophy Garden south of Hearthome City.
steps.content: Go to the Trophy Garden south of Hearthome City.

steps.title: DO NOT GO INTO GARDEN.
steps.content: DO NOT GO INTO GARDEN. Go to the door that leads to the owner, save before you talk to him!

steps.title: Go into the room, talk to owner.
steps.content: Go into the room, talk to owner. Every time he asks you something say "Yes". He will say he saw a Pokémon in the garden, if it is Meowth, continue, If it is not, restart and try again.

steps.title: Go into garden in the back and use a Max Repel, keep using the Poké Radar as much as possible, when grass has little sparks, go there, if it is Meowth catch it, if not try again.
steps.content: Go into garden in the back and use a Max Repel, keep using the Poké Radar as much as possible, when grass has little sparks, go there, if it is Meowth catch it, if not try again.

steps.title: Once you have Meowth raise it to level thirty but DO NOT LET IT EVOLVE!
steps.content: Once you have Meowth raise it to level thirty but DO NOT LET IT EVOLVE! It will learn Pay Day; a move which if used, will give you extra money after a battle.

steps.title: Give it an Amulet Coin and use it in battles.
steps.content: Give it an Amulet Coin and use it in battles.

steps.title: Beat the Elite Four before doing this.
steps.content: Beat the Elite Four before doing this.

steps.title: Go to Spring Path and then to Turnback Cave.
steps.content: Go to Spring Path and then to Turnback Cave. When going to the Turnback Cave, bring a Pokémon that knows Defog and Rock Smash.

steps.title: Keep wandering until you reach Giratina's room.
steps.content: Keep wandering until you reach Giratina's room. If you already fought Giratina there will be a free item every time you get there, collect it and sell it.

steps.title: Way number three requires the Super Rod.
steps.content: Way number three requires the Super Rod.

steps.title: Use it at Valley Windworks, if you get a Shelder catch and see if it is holding a Pearl, if it is, sell it and if you want, release the Shelder.
steps.content: Use it at Valley Windworks, if you get a Shelder catch and see if it is holding a Pearl, if it is, sell it and if you want, release the Shelder.

steps.title: Get any Pokémon with the "Pickup" ability (Zigzagoon, Meowth, etc.
steps.content: Get any Pokémon with the "Pickup" ability (Zigzagoon, Meowth, etc. ) and fight a bunch of wild Pokémon, each time check your Pickup Pokémon for hold items, if there is one, sell it.

steps.title: Ensure that your Pokémon is at a rather high level.
steps.content: Ensure that your Pokémon is at a rather high level. This needs to be level 40+.

steps.title: Ensure that your lead Pokémon has either luck incense or an Amulet Coin as an item they're holding.
steps.content: Ensure that your lead Pokémon has either luck incense or an Amulet Coin as an item they're holding. The player must also have a vs. seeker.

steps.title: Go down from Veilstone City or left from Pastoria City.
steps.content: Go down from Veilstone City or left from Pastoria City. Either way will lead you to the same place.

steps.title: Along the hotel resort area, you'll eventually come across a flight of stairs that directly to Sunyshore.
steps.content: Along the hotel resort area, you'll eventually come across a flight of stairs that directly to Sunyshore. Do not go there. When you pass the stairs, go to route 222. This is the first thing you'll come across.

steps.title: When you get to route 222, look for a big patch of grass and a sign next to it.
steps.content: When you get to route 222, look for a big patch of grass and a sign next to it. Travel slightly up from there. You'll see a trainer sitting there alone. He is a rich boy trainer.

steps.title: Battle the trainer.
steps.content: Battle the trainer. You will get a lot of money if you win ($4500+). if your lead Pokémon has either a luck incense or Amulet Coin, you'll get double the money, so you'll end up getting around $12000+. If you have already battled him before, use the vs. seeker near him. He will often battle again.
